content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0, y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(x=41.0, y=-80.0)
- Burner inserter (position x=39.5, y=-79.5) that puts into the stone furnace
- Burner inserter (position x=41.5, y=-78.5) that puts into the stone furnace

### Copper cable factory
No entities found for this structure

### Electricity generator at position(x=106.5, y=-32.5)
Consists of 
- Offshore pump (position x=106.5, y=-32.5)
- Boiler (position x=111.5, y=-32.0)
- Steam engine (position x=117.5, y=-30.5)
- Pipe group (position x=107.5, y=-34.5) that connects the offshore pump to the boiler
- Pipe group (position x=105.5, y=-32.5) that connects the boiler to the steam engine

### Transport belt system at position(x=63.5, y=-53.5)
Consists of 
- Transport belt (position x=63.5, y=-53.5)
- Transport belt (position x=64.5, y=-53.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner entities without fuel
- Make sure to provide fuel to burner entities before using them
### Errors when using inserter entities without source items
- Ensure that the inserter entity has source items to put into the destination entity
### Errors when using entities without ingredients
- Ensure that the entity has the required ingredients to function
### Errors when using steam engine without being connected to the electric network
- Connect the steam engine to the electric network to use it
### Errors when using pipe groups without fluid
- Ensure that the pipe group has fluid to transport

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions defined by the agent. 
No important variables assigned.
